articles.title: Redemption of Past Is Legal, Moral Obligation of Japan
articles.content:
Redemption of Past Is Legal, Moral Obligation of Japan
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Association of Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting and Their Bereaved Families made public a statement on Sunday on the elapse of 80 years since the Japanese imperialists fabricated and proclaimed the criminal "National Mobilization Law".
					 The spokesman said that the Japanese reactionary ruling circles obsessed with the ambition for overseas invasion made public the above-said fascist law on April 1, 1938 to make up for human and material resources needed for the expansion of war and severely clamped down on the Korean people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists took the Korean people to battlefields for war of aggression, forced labor and disgraceful sex slavery and inflicted pain and death upon them.
					
					 These atrocities against mankind can never be pardoned as they are the hideous human rights abuses unprecedented in history.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese authorities and right-wing reactionaries force the history textbook full of embellishment and falsity to be used for education, claiming that there was no the forcible drafting of Koreans and in those days it was a "legal" in those days.
					
					 Worse still, they are taking the lead in crying out for the sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK in the international arena, not content with slandering the DPRK, the biggest victim, and are laying bare an attempt for reinvasion of the Korean peninsula while positively joining in the reckless U.S. military exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that they are severely infringing upon the democratic national rights and right to existence of the victims of forcible drafting and Korean citizens in Japan, their descendants.
					
					 Behind the Japanese reactionaries' vicious moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) is a sinister aim to divert elsewhere the spearhead of bitter denunciation of the international community for their evading liquidation of past and, furthermore, to bury in oblivion the blood-stained past and carry out their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" by doubling the efforts for a military giant.
					
					 The liquidation of past is Japan's legal and moral obligation and historic task.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should immediately stop the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and all human rights abuses against Koreans in Japan and thoroughly make an apology and reparation for the victims and their bereaved families as early as possible.

articles.title: Spring Tree-Planting Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Tree-Planting Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A spring tree-planting campaign is now brisk in the DPRK.
					 Officials and working people across the country turned out as one to plant more than one hundred million trees in areas of tens of thousands hectares in March true to the Party's will to conduct a vigorous forest restoration campaign to cover the mountains of the country with green woods.
					
					The spring tree-planting campaign was vigorously conducted in Pyongyang City and more than 2,500,000 trees were planted in the leisure complexes and surrounding mountains.
					
					 The campaign is being promoted at the last phase in South Hwanghae Province.
					
					Officials and working people in North Hwanghae Province planed in detail the phased scenario and effectively conducted the work for manpower mobilisation and supply of saplings to plant over 50,000,000 trees.
					
					 Working people in South Phyongan Province planted over 7 million trees more than the same period of last year in areas of several thousand hectares in a hot wind of collectivist emulation.
					
					 Nampho City carried out the spring tree-planting plan for areas of hundreds of hectares.
					
					 Officials and working people in South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and Kangwon Provinces and other places are expanding successes in planting trees every day through their devoted efforts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Inevitable Product of Capitalism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Inevitable Product of Capitalism
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The imperialists become vociferous about "advantage" of capitalism as never before, but they can never hide the rotten capitalist society with any honey words and false propaganda, Rodong Sinmun says in an article Sunday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The escalation of the socio-class contradiction and confrontation is an inevitable product of the capitalist society.
					
					 The political system of capitalism is the most reactionary one trampling down the independent right of the popular masses.
					
					 The politics in the capitalist society is under the monopoly financial combine's thumb and speaks for the interest of the exploiting classes from A to Z.
					
					 The capitalist economic system is the most reactionary one spawning bipolarization such as the rich getting ever richer and the poor ever poorer.
					
					 The capitalist economic system is the vicious exploitative society in which capitalists meet their limitless greed in return for leaving no stone untried to violate the interest of the working masses in all economic levers.
					
					 The capitalist cultural system is the most reactionary one serving only the realisation of the interests of the capitalist class.
					
					 The reactionary culture prevalent in the capitalist society is a tool for paralyzing the revolutionary consciousness of the working masses and oppressing and exploiting them in the interests of the exploiting class who has the means of production.
					
					 Capitalist society is "heaven" for a handful of the privileged classes, but it is a living hell for working people who have no money.
					
					 Inevitable is the escalation of the socio-class contradiction and confrontation in this system.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Party Condemned for Its Misbehavior
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Party Condemned for Its Misbehavior
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on March 30 carried an editorial titled "Liberal Korea Party, Head is problem, not the mouth".
					 Referring to the fact that a spokesman of the "Liberal Korea Party" said that the people should make an apology for having doubted 7 hours after ferry Sewol disaster, defending Park Geun Hye on March 28 when the prosecution made public the result of the investigation into the disaster, the editorial said: 
					
					 The behavior of the "Liberal Korea Party" shows that heavyweights of the party including Hong Jun Phyo do not think normally.
					
					 What matters was the head of the party, not the mouth.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Denounced
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Denounced 
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The fact that traitor Park Geun Hye group fabricated the data related with the day when the ferry Sewol disaster occurred in a bid to flee from the responsibility of the disaster was brought to light by the prosecution on March 28 to arouse astonishment and indignation of the people from all walks of life, according to south Korean media.
					 A spokesperson of the Minju Party said that the reason why Park made desperate efforts to hide the truth behind the disaster was disclosed through the result of the prosecution's investigation.
					
					 A spokesperson of the Democratic and Peace Party deplored that people who could be rescued were killed due to the disregard and irresponsibility of the Park's regime.
					
					 A spokesperson of the Jongui Party pressed for calling to task the depraved regime and its vassal forces which intentionally tried to evade the responsibility.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed with due ceremony at the Russian Institute for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on March 25.
					 Vadim Kudimin, director of the Russian institute, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The chairman said that the life of the President who set forth the scientific ideology and theory and led the Korean revolution to victory was a career for the country and the people and his exploits are brilliantly recorded in history.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President's ideology and theory serve as a precious guideline for the world progressives who advance along the road of independence.
					
					 Inheriting the revolutionary traditions provided by the President arises as an especially important issue for the Korean people at present.
					
					 The struggle of the Korean people for opposing invaders and bringing about happy life is based on the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance. We should disseminate the spirit to not only Russia but the world.
					
					 We would celebrate the birth anniversary of the President and positively conduct the study and dissemination of the Juche idea whose scientific accuracy and truth have been proved in practice.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sweden
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sweden
 Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A Swedish preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Stockholm on March 21.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Entidad coreana exige a Japon la liquidacion de sus crimenes del pasado
articles.content:
Entidad coreana exige a Japon la liquidacion de sus crimenes del pasado
Pyongyang, primero de abril (ACNC) -- El vocero de la Asociacion de Coreanos Reclutados Forzosamente y Sus Familiares hizo publica hoy una declaracion en relacion con que se cumplen 80 anos desde cuando el imperio japones inventara y proclamara la criminal "Ley de Movilizacion General del Estado".
					Cautivada de su ambicion de agresion al ultramar, la capa gobernante reaccionaria de Japon promulgo el dia primero de abril de 1938 la dicha "ley" de caracter fascista para satisfacer los recursos humanos y materiales necesarios a la escalada de guerra y reprimio cruelmente al pueblo coreano en virtud de ella, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					El crimen inhumano del imperio japones que movilizo a muchos coreanos a la guerra agresiva y les impuso el trabajo forzoso, la vida de esclava sexual y otras penalidades, constituye el intolerable delito mas bestial de pesima calana sin precedente en la historia de la humanidad.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades japoneses y los reaccionarios ultraderechistas chismean que no hay pruebas sobre el reclutamiento forzoso de los coreanos y eso fue "juridico" en aquel entonces. Y obligan usar en la educacion el manual de historia lleno de fraudes.
					
					Insatisfechos con la denigracion de la RPDC, gran victima de sus crimenes, ellas hablan antes que nadie en la arena internacional de la sancion y presion anti-RPDC y exponen abiertamente su intento de reagredir a la Peninsula Coreana tomando parte activa en los imprudentes simulacros militares anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que violan seriamente el derecho a subsistencia y otros democraticos y nacionales de los coreanos residentes en Japon que son victimas del reclutamiento forzoso y sus descendientes.
					
					Con tal campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), ellos tratan de alcanzar su malsano intento de evadir la punta de censuras y condenas de la sociedad internacional hacia ellos mismos que eluden la liquidacion del pasado, encubrir para siempre sus crimenes ensangrentados y lograr su sueno anejo de la "esfera de coprosperidad de Gran Asia Oriental" al dar mas acicate a la conversion de su pais en potencia militar.
					
					La liquidacion del pasado es la obligacion legal y moral del pais isla y ademas la tarea historica.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben retirar ahora mismo su anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC y los actos violadores de DDHH contra los coreanos en Japon. Y deben pedir cuanto antes la disculpa e indemnizacion a los coreanos damnificados y sus familiares.
